Steam (ST): ...30 minutes had already passed since Rudolf's group had left the guesthouse.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Thirty minutes had already passed since Rudolf's group had left the guesthouse.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...30 minutes had already passed since Rudolf's group had left the guesthouse.
PC Japanese (JP): …留弗夫たちがゲストハウスを出てから、すでに３０分は経過していた。
Russian (RU): С того времени, как группа Рудольфа покинула домик для гостей, прошло уже 30 минут.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Trinta minutos já tinham se passado desde que o grupo de Rudolf deixou a casa de hóspedes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …距留弗夫他們離開賓館，已過了三十分鐘。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …距留弗夫他们离开宾馆，已过了三十分钟。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Erano già trascorsi trenta minuti da quando il gruppo di Rudolf aveva lasciato la casa degli ospiti.

Steam (ST): By any measure, their return was too late. ...And Krauss and Natsuhi, who waited by the entrance, were reaching the limits of their patience.
Umineko Project (UP): By any measure, their return was too late.{n}...And Krauss and Natsuhi, who were waiting by the entrance, were by now about as restless as they could stand.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): By any measure, their return was too late....And Krauss and Natsuhi, who were waiting by the entrance, were reaching the limits of their patience.
PC Japanese (JP): いくらなんでも、戻りが遅すぎる。…玄関で待ち続ける蔵臼と夏妃の焦燥も限界に来ていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): いくらなんでも、戻りが遅すぎる。{n}…玄関で待ち続ける蔵臼と夏妃の焦燥も限界に来ていた。
Russian (RU): По любым меркам, они значительно задержались.{n}...И у Краусса с Нацухи, ожидавших их возле входа, уже истекало терпение.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Independentemente das circunstâncias, eles já estavam demorando demais para retornar. ...Krauss e Natsuhi, que estavam esperando na entrada, estavam agora tão inquietos quanto podiam aguentar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 再怎麼說，他們回來得也太晚了。{n}…一直在大門處等候的藏臼與夏妃的心情焦躁到了極點。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 再怎么说，他们回来得也太晚了。{n}…一直在大门处等候的藏臼与夏妃的心情焦躁到了极点。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non c'era dubbio che stessero tardando troppo a tornare. ... E Krauss e Natsuhi, che erano in attesa all'ingresso, stavano esaurendo la loro pazienza.

Steam (ST): The chain was set on the door. That was a precaution in the event that Rudolf's group was attacked and the master key stolen from them.
Umineko Project (UP): The chain was set on the door. That was a precaution in the event that Rudolf's group was attacked, and the master key was stolen from them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The chain was set on the door. That was a precaution in the event that Rudolf's group was attacked, and the master key stolen from them.
PC Japanese (JP): 扉にはチェーンが掛けてある。それは、留弗夫たちが万一襲われ、マスターキーを奪われた場合に備えたものだ。
Russian (RU): Дверь была закрыта на цепочку. Это была мера предосторожности на тот случай, если на группу Рудольфа будет совершено нападение, и они лишатся главного ключа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A corrente estava colocada na porta. Aquela era uma precaução caso o grupo de Rudolf fosse atacado, e a chave mestra roubada deles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 門上掛著鏈條鎖。這是以防，萬一留弗夫他們遇襲，被奪去總鑰匙的情況，而做的措施。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 门上挂着链条锁。这是以防，万一留弗夫他们遇袭，被夺去总钥匙的情况，而做的措施。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La catena di sicurezza della porta era inserita. Si trattava di una precauzione nel caso in cui il gruppo di Rudolf fosse stato attaccato, e gli venisse rubato il passepartout.

Steam (ST): For that reason, they needed to wait by the entrance like this for the others to return...
Umineko Project (UP): For that reason, they needed to wait by the entrance like this for the others to return...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): For that reason, they needed to wait by the entrance like this for the others to return...
PC Japanese (JP): その為、彼らの帰りをこうして玄関で待つ必要があった…。
Russian (RU): По этой причине им пришлось дежурить у входа в ожидании возвращения остальных...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por essa razão, eles precisavam esperar assim na entrada pelo retorno dos outros...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，必須待在大門處，等他們回來…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，必须待在大门处，等他们回来…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perciò, c'era bisogno che aspettassero così, all'ingresso, il ritorno degli altri...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "...They really are too late. Don't you think something might have happened to them...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "......They really are taking too long. You don't think something happened to them...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......They really are too late. You don't think something happened to them...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……さすがに遅すぎます。彼らの身に何かあったのでは…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……さすがに遅すぎます。彼らの身に何かあったのでは…」
Russian (RU): "......Они и вправду задерживаются. Тебе не кажется, что с ними могло что‐нибудь случиться?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Eles realmente estão demorando demais. Não acha que pode ter acontecido alguma coisa com eles...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……實在太慢了。他們會不會是出了什麼事…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……实在太慢了。他们会不会是出了什么事…？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Ci stanno mettendo davvero troppo. Non pensi che potrebbe essergli successo qualcosa...?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Steam (ST): Krauss glanced between his watch and the door, struggling to keep his composure.
Umineko Project (UP): Krauss glanced between the clock and the door, struggling to feign composure.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Krauss glanced between his watch and the door, struggling to keep his composure.
PC Japanese (JP): 蔵臼は時計と扉を見比べながら、冷静さを装うことに徹していた。
Russian (RU): Краусс перевёл взгляд с часов на дверь, изо всех сил пытаясь сохранять хладнокровие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Krauss olhou de relance entre o relógio e a porta, resistindo para fingir compostura.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 藏臼交替看著門與時鐘，依然強裝著冷靜。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 藏臼交替看着门与时钟，依然强装着冷静。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Krauss spostò lo sguardo tra l'orologio da polso e la porta, sforzandosi di mantenere il suo contegno.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "If...something happened to prevent them from returning..."
Umineko Project (UP): "If...by some chance they were not to return......"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "If, ...something happened to prevent them from returning......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「もし、…彼らが戻らないようなことがあるならば……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「もし、…彼らが戻らないようなことがあるならば……」
Russian (RU): "Может... что‐то произошло, что помешало их возвращению..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Se... por alguma chance, eles não retornarem......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「如果，…他們不回來的話……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「如果，…他们不回来的话……」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Se... se fosse successo qualcosa che gli ha impedito di tornare..."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "...A terrible thought, but it seems we should ready ourselves for that possibility. ...So, it really was too reckless after all."
Umineko Project (UP): "...A terrible thought, but it looks as though we should ready ourselves for that possibility. ......It really was reckless, after all."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「…辛い想像だが、その覚悟を始めた方が良さそうだ。……やはり、無用心だったのだ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…辛い想像だが、その覚悟を始めた方が良さそうだ。……やはり、無用心だったのだ」
Russian (RU): "...Страшная мысль, но судя по всему, нам следует быть готовыми и к такому варианту. ......Всё‐таки это было действительно безрассудно."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Um pensamento terrível, mas parece que devemos nos preparar para essa possibilidade. ......Isso realmente foi imprudente, afinal."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…雖說不是滋味，但看來，是時候開始做好這心理準備了。……果然，是大意了啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…虽说不是滋味，但看来，是时候开始做好这心理准备了。……果然，是大意了啊。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Un pensiero terribile, ma pare che dovremmo prepararci a questa possibilità. ... È stata davvero una mossa avventata, dopotutto."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "Th-That is what I said...! Why did they go outside when they knew it was this dangerous...?! How foolish! Why go outside, even though Rosa-san had just been attacked...?!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Th‐that is what I said...! Why did they go outside when they knew it was this dangerous...! How foolish! Why go outside, even though Rosa‐san had just been attacked...?!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Th, that is what I said...! Why did they go outside when they knew it was this dangerous...! How foolish! Why go outside, even though Rosa-san had just been attacked...?!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「わ、私はそうだと申し上げました…！　なぜ彼らはこれほどの危険を承知で外に…！　愚かなことです！　楼座さんが襲われたばかりだというのに、なぜに外へ…！！」
Russian (RU): "О... об этом я и говорила!.. Почему они вышли наружу, когда им было известно, насколько это опасно!... Как глупо! Для чего выходить на улицу, когда на Розу‐сан совсем недавно напали?!!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "F‐Foi isso o que eu disse...! Por que eles saíram quando sabiam que era tão perigoso...?! Que tolice! Por que sair, mesmo que a Rosa‐san tivesse acabado de ser atacada...?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我、我就是這麼說的…！為什麼他們明知如此危險，還要去外面…！太愚蠢了！樓座妹妹才剛剛遇害，為什麼要去外面…！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我、我就是这么说的…！为什么他们明知如此危险，还要去外面…！太愚蠢了！楼座妹妹才刚刚遇害，为什么要去外面…！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "I-Io l'avevo detto...! Perché sono usciti pur sapendo che era così pericoloso...! Che follia! Perché uscire, nonostante Rosa-san fosse stata appena attaccata...?!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "......Nothing will come of saying that now. ...At any rate, there are now three adults in the guesthouse. Me, you, ...and Eva, who's asleep with a high fever."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Nothing will come from saying that now. ...In any event, there are now three adults in the guesthouse. Me, you, ......and Eva, who's asleep with a high fever."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........Nothing will come from saying that now. ...Anyways, this way, there are three adults in the guesthouse. Me, you, ......and Eva, who's asleep with a high fever."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………それを言っても始まらん。…とにかく、これでゲストハウスに大人は３人。私と夏妃、……そして高熱で寝込んでいる絵羽だけだ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………それを言っても始まらん。…とにかく、これでゲストハウスに大人は３人。私と夏妃、……そして高熱で寝込んでいる絵羽だけだ」
Russian (RU): ".........Сделанного не воротишь. ...В любом случае, получается, что здесь, в домике для гостей, трое взрослых. Я, ты и Ева, лежащая с высокой температурой."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Dizer isso agora não mudará nada. ...De qualquer forma, agora há três adultos na casa de hóspedes. Eu, você......e a Eva, que está dormindo com uma febre alta."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………講這些也於事無補。…總之，這下賓館裡就只剩三個大人了。我、夏妃，……還有因高燒躺著的繪羽。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………讲这些也于事无补。…总之，这下宾馆里就只剩三个大人了。我、夏妃，……还有因高烧躺着的绘羽。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Dirlo adesso non cambierà nulla. ... Ad ogni modo, in questa situazione, ci sono tre adulti nella casa degli ospiti. Io, tu... ed Eva, che sta dormendo e ha la febbre alta."

Steam (ST): At that time, the forceful sound of a door being opened came from the hallway, and they heard Eva's panicked voice.
Umineko Project (UP): At that time, there was the forceful sound from the hallway of a door being opened, and Eva's shrieking voice.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At that time, there was the forceful sound from the hallway of a door being opened, and they heard Eva's panicked voice.
PC Japanese (JP): その時、廊下から勢い良く開く扉の音と、絵羽の金切り声が聞こえてきた。
Russian (RU): В этот момент раздался громкий звук распахнувшейся двери коридора, и до них донёсся испуганный голос Евы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Naquela hora, ouviu‐se no corredor o som vigoroso de uma porta sendo aberta, e a voz aguda de Eva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 正在此時，從走廊上響起了氣勢十足的開門聲，與繪羽刺耳的喊聲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 正在此时，从走廊上响起了气势十足的开门声，与绘羽刺耳的喊声。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In quell'istante, ci fu un forte rumore di una porta che veniva aperta nel corridoio, e udirono la voce agitata di Eva.

Steam (ST): ...That voice kept calling out Hideyoshi's name. ...It seemed as though she'd had a bad dream or something due to her fever...and was calling for her husband.
Umineko Project (UP): ...That voice kept calling Hideyoshi's name. ......It seemed as though the high fever had given her a bad dream or something, and now she was calling her husband's name.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...That voice kept calling Hideyoshi's name.......It seemed as though, while down with a high fever, she had had a bad dream or something and was calling her husband's name.
PC Japanese (JP): …その声は秀吉の名を呼び続けている。……高熱にうなされた彼女が、何か悪い夢でも見て夫の名を呼んでいるように見えた。
Russian (RU): ...Этот голос взывал к имени Хидэёши. ......Могло показаться, что из‐за высокой температуры ей привиделся дурной сон, и спросонья она стала взывать к имени своего мужа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Aquela voz continuou chamando o nome de Hideyoshi. ......Parecia como se a febre alta tivesse lhe dado um sonho ruim ou algo assim, e agora ela estava chamando o nome de seu marido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …她在不停地呼喊著秀吉的名字。……看來是受高燒所困的她，因做了什麼噩夢，而呼喚起了丈夫的名字。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …她在不停地呼喊着秀吉的名字。……看来是受高烧所困的她，因做了什么噩梦，而呼唤起了丈夫的名字。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quella voce continuava a chiamare il nome di Hideyoshi. ... Sembrava che, presa dalla febbre forte, avesse fatto un incubo o qualcosa di simile e che stesse chiamando suo marito.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "Eva-san, ...what is it, are you okay...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Eva‐san...what is it, are you alright...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Eva-san..., what is it, are you alright...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「絵羽さん…、どうしましたか、大丈夫ですか…？」
Russian (RU): "Ева‐сан... В чём дело, ты в порядке?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eva‐san...o que é aconteceu? Você está bem...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「繪羽…，怎麼了，還好嗎…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「绘羽…，怎么了，还好吗…？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Eva-san... cosa c'è, stai bene...?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "...Wh-Where is my husband?! My husband isn't here!! Even though he promised that he'd stay with me the whole time! Even though he promised that he'd grasp my hand the whole time!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Wh‐...where is my husband?! My husband isn't here!! He promised that he'd stay with me the whole time! He promised that he'd hold my hand the whole time!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Wh, ...where is my husband?! My husband isn't here!! Even though he promised that he'd stay with me the whole time! Even though he promised that he'd grasp my hand the whole time!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「う、…うちの人はどこ？！　うちの人がいないのッ！！　ずっと一緒にいるって約束してくれたのに！　ずっと手を握ってくれてるって約束したのにッ！！」
Russian (RU): "Гд... Где мой муж?! Моего мужа здесь нет!!! Он ведь обещал, что будет со мной всё это время! Он ведь обещал, что всё время будет держать меня за руку!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "O‐Onde está meu marido?! Meu marido não está aqui!! Ele prometeu que ficaria comigo o tempo todo! Ele prometeu que seguraria minha mão o tempo todo!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我、…我家那位在哪兒？！我家那位不見了！！明明約好要一直待一起的！明明約好要一直握著我的手的！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我、…我家那位在哪儿？！我家那位不见了！！明明约好要一直待一起的！明明约好要一直握着我的手的！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "D... Dov'è mio marito?! Mio marito non è qui!! Anche se mi ha promesso che sarebbe rimasto con me tutto il tempo! Anche se mi ha promesso che mi avrebbe stretto la mano tutto il tempo!!"

Steam (ST): ...Krauss was struck dumb by this attitude of hers, which she had never shown in front of him before, but Natsuhi understood her feelings.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Krauss was taken aback by this attitude of hers, which she had never shown in front of him before, but Natsuhi understood her feelings.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Krauss was struck dumb by this attitude of hers, which she had never shown in front of him before, but Natsuhi understood her feelings.
PC Japanese (JP): …蔵臼の前で絶対に見せることのないその姿に、蔵臼は呆然としたが、夏妃はその気持ちを理解した。
Russian (RU): ...Краусс буквально остолбенел от такого напора эмоций, которых она никогда раньше не проявляла при нём, но Нацухи хорошо понимала её чувства.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Krauss foi surpreendido por aquela atitude, que ela nunca tinha demonstrado na frente dele antes, mas Natsuhi entendia os sentimentos dela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …藏臼不禁因這副絕不會在他面前露出的樣子愣住了，而夏妃則理解了她的心情。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …藏臼不禁因这副绝不会在他面前露出的样子愣住了，而夏妃则理解了她的心情。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Krauss rimase senza parole davanti a questo suo atteggiamento, che lei non gli aveva mai mostrato, ma Natsuhi capiva come doveva sentirsi.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "...C-Calm down... Hideyoshi-san is with Rudolf-san and Kyrie-san, and they're outside right now."
Umineko Project (UP): "......C‐calm down... Hideyoshi‐san is with Rudolf‐san and Kyrie‐san, and they're outside right now."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......C, calm down... Hideyoshi-san is with Rudolf-san and Kyrie-san, and they're outside right now."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……お、落ち着いて…。秀吉さんは留弗夫さんたちと一緒に、今、表へ出ています。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……お、落ち着いて…。秀吉さんは留弗夫さんたちと一緒に、今、表へ出ています」
Russian (RU): "......У... успокойся... Хидэёши‐сан ушёл вместе с Рудольфом‐саном и Кирие‐сан, и сейчас они находятся снаружи."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......A‐Acalme‐se... O Hideyoshi‐san está com o Rudolf‐san e a Kyrie‐san, e eles estão lá fora agora mesmo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……冷、冷靜一下…。秀吉正與留弗夫他們一起，去了外面。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……冷、冷静一下…。秀吉正与留弗夫他们一起，去了外面。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... C-Calmati... Hideyoshi-san è con Rudolf-san e Kyrie-san, e in questo momento sono fuori."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "Outside?!?! Wh-Wh-Why, why did he go outside, after he promised that he'd stay with me the whole time?! You mustn't go outside, the witch is outside, you mustn't go, you'll be killed!! Waaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhh...!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Outside?!?! Whwh‐why, he promised that he'd stay with me the whole time, why did he go outside?! You mustn't go outside, the witch is outside, you mustn't go, you'll be killed!! Waaa{0}a{0}a{0}a{0}aaagg{0}g{0}g{0}g{0}g{0}gghhh...!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Outside?!?! Wh, wh, why, why did he go outside, after he promised that he'd stay with me the whole time?! You mustn't go outside, the witch is outside, you mustn't go, you'll be killed!! Waaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhh...!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「表へッ？！？！　どど、どうしてよ、私とずっと一緒にいてくれるって約束したのに、どうして表になんか行ってるの？！　表へ出ては駄目、表には魔女がいるわ、行っては駄目、殺されてしまうッ！！　わあああああぁあああぁあぁ…！！」

Russian (RU): Новая ведьма, посчитав, что главное, лишь бы были вонзены кинжалы, наверняка бы просто воткнула кинжалы в гору мяса, по форме ни чем не похожую на {y:0:Челове}{n:0:челове}ка.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A nova bruxa, pensando que tudo funcionaria perfeitamente, desde que os goivasse com as estacas, ......provavelmente tinha apenas enfiado uma estaca em um monte de carne que sequer tinha mais a forma de um {y:0:Humano}{n:0:humano}.

Steam (ST): "If there wasn't a typhoon in the first place, the boat would have arrived before noon. That's not much of a silver lining."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「说到底，要是没台风，在上午就会来船了。能否将此称为不幸中的万幸，还是有点微妙哦。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Se in primo luogo non ci fosse stato il tifone, il motoscafo sarebbe arrivato prima di mezzogiorno. Non sono sicura che in questo caso si possa dire che non tutti i mali vengono per nuocere."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "...Eva-san, how do you feel? Please, try to take it easy."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Eva‐san, how are you feeling physically? Please, try to take it easy."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Eva-san, how do you feel? Please, try to take it easy."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……絵羽さん、体の具合はいかがですか？　無理をされないようにしてください。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……絵羽さん、体の具合はいかがですか？　無理をされないようにしてください」
Russian (RU): "......Ева‐сан, как твоё самочувствие? Пожалуйста, постарайся не напрягать себя."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Eva‐san, como você está se sentindo fisicamente? Por favor, tente pegar leve."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……繪羽，身體狀況還好嗎？請不要勉強自己。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……绘羽，身体状况还好吗？请不要勉强自己。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Eva-san, come si sente? Per piacere, cerchi di stare a riposo."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "Thank you. ...I still feel like I have a fever, but this is no time to complain about that. ...For the children's sake as well, this is no time to be bedridden."
Umineko Project (UP): "Thank you. ...I still have a temperature, but now isn't the time to be saying things like that. ......Now is not the time to be stuck in bed, for the children's sake as well."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Thank you. ...I still feel a fever, but now isn't the time to talk about that. ......Now is not the time to fall asleep, for the children's sake as well."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ありがとう。…熱はまだ感じるけど、そんなことを言ってる場合じゃないわ。……子どもの為にも、今は寝込んでる場合じゃない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ありがとう。…熱はまだ感じるけど、そんなことを言ってる場合じゃないわ。……子どもの為にも、今は寝込んでる場合じゃない」
Russian (RU): "Спасибо. ...Я пока ещё чувствую жар, но сейчас не время говорить об этом. ......Сейчас не время для сна, ради детей мы должны держаться."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Obrigada. ...Ainda tenho febre, mas agora não é a hora de dizer coisas assim. ......Agora não é a hora de ficar presa na cama, pelo bem das crianças."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「謝謝。…感覺還是有點熱度，但現在不是說這種事的時候。……就算是為了孩子們，我也不能去躺著。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「谢谢。…感觉还是有点热度，但现在不是说这种事的时候。……就算是为了孩子们，我也不能去躺着。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Grazie. ... Mi sento ancora la febbre addosso, ma ora non è il momento di discuterne. ... Non è il momento di riposare, anche per il bene dei ragazzi."

Steam (ST): After crying so much in front of Hideyoshi's corpse, Eva had felt a strong self-awareness of her position as a mother, and her expression conveyed a strong will.
Umineko Project (UP): After crying so much in front of Hideyoshi's body, Eva had now gained a strong self‐awareness that she was a mother, and her expression conveyed a strong will.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After crying so much in front of Hideyoshi's corpse, Eva had felt a strong self-awareness that she was a mother, and her expression conveyed a strong will.
PC Japanese (JP): あれほどに秀吉の遺体の前で涙を流した絵羽は、今では母の強い自覚を持ち、強い意志を感じさせる表情を浮かべていた。
Russian (RU): После долгого плача над трупом Хидэёши, Ева ощутила твёрдое самосознание матери, и выражение её лица отражало сильную волю.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Depois de chorar tanto na frente do corpo de Hideyoshi, Eva tinha ganho agora uma forte autoconsciência de que ela era uma mãe, e sua expressão demonstrava uma vontade resoluta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在秀吉遺體前淚如雨下的繪羽，此刻已具有作為人母的強烈自覺，浮現出了能令人感受到強烈意志的表情。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在秀吉遗体前泪如雨下的绘羽，此刻已具有作为人母的强烈自觉，浮现出了能令人感受到强烈意志的表情。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo aver pianto a lungo davanti al cadavere di Hideyoshi, Eva aveva realizzato appieno il suo ruolo di Madre, e dalla sua espressione trasudava una grande forza di volontà.

Steam (ST): ...In actual fact, her fever still hadn't gone down.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Actually, her fever still hadn't gone down.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …実際には、彼女の熱はまだ引いてはいない。
Russian (RU): ...На деле её жар всё ещё не спал.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Na verdade, a febre dela ainda não tinha baixado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …實際上，她的燒還沒有退。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …实际上，她的烧还没有退。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... In realtà, la sua febbre non era scesa.

Steam (ST): And she was aware of that. If she didn't keep a strong hold on herself, she felt as though the fever would make her mind hazy again.
Umineko Project (UP): And she was aware of that. Whenever she wasn't galvanizing herself, she felt the fever starting to make her mind hazy again.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And she was aware of that. If she didn't keep a strong hold on herself, she felt as though the fever would make her mind hazy again.
PC Japanese (JP): それは彼女も自覚している。自らを奮い立たせなければ、熱で再び朦朧としてくるのを感じていた。
Russian (RU): И ей было известно об этом. Если бы она не воодушевила сама себя, она чувствовала, что жар снова может затуманить её разум.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E ela estava ciente disso. Quando ela não estava se galvanizando, ela sentia a febre começar a deixar sua mente nebulosa de novo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她也自知這一點。感覺到了，如果她不自行振作精神的話，就會再度燒得意識朦朧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她也自知这一点。感觉到了，如果她不自行振作精神的话，就会再度烧得意识朦胧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E lei ne era consapevole. Sentiva che se non avesse mantenuto un controllo ferreo su di sé, la febbre le avrebbe di nuovo annebbiato la mente.

Steam (ST): By this point, the first floor formed a final line of defense set up by Krauss, Natsuhi, and Eva. The children and the guest, Nanjo, had been strongly warned not to go downstairs without taking great care.
Umineko Project (UP): By this point, the first floor was a final line of defense made by Krauss, Natsuhi, and Eva.{n}The children and the guest, Nanjo, had been strongly warned not to carelessly come downstairs.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): By this point, the first floor was a final line of defense made by Krauss, Natsuhi, and Eva. The children and the guest, Nanjo, had been strongly warned not to carelessly go downstairs.
PC Japanese (JP): １階はもはや、蔵臼と夏妃と絵羽による最終防衛線だった。子どもたちと客人の南條には、迂闊に１階に降りてきてはいけないと強く言ってある。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): １階はもはや、蔵臼と夏妃と絵羽による最終防衛線だった。{n}子どもたちと客人の南條には、迂闊に１階に降りてきてはいけないと強く言ってある。
Russian (RU): К этому моменту второй этаж оставался последней линией обороны, созданной Крауссом, Нацухи и Евой.{n}Детей и гостя, Нанджо, настоятельно попросили не спускаться вниз без острой нужды.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Neste momento, o primeiro andar era uma linha final de defesa feita por Krauss, Natsuhi e Eva.{n}As crianças e Nanjo tinham sido firmemente alertados para não descerem as escadas descuidadamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 一樓已變成了藏臼、夏妃、繪羽三人構成的最終防衛線。{n}重重警告過了孩子們與客人南條，不准大意地來到一樓。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 一楼已变成了藏臼、夏妃、绘羽三人构成的最终防卫线。{n}重重警告过了孩子们与客人南条，不准大意地来到一楼。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A questo punto, il piano terra era l'ultima linea di difesa sorretta da Krauss, Natsuhi, ed Eva. Ai ragazzi e all'ospite, Nanjo, era stato caldamente raccomandato di non fare la sciocchezza di scendere giù.

Steam (ST): If the culprit used a ladder or something, it probably wouldn't be impossible for them to attack from the second floor.
Umineko Project (UP): If the culprit used a ladder or something, it probably wouldn't be impossible for them to attack from upstairs.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If the culprit used a ladder or something, it probably wouldn't be impossible for them to attack from the second floor.
PC Japanese (JP): 梯子などを用いれば、２階から襲うことは不可能ではないだろう。
Russian (RU): Если преступник использует лестницу или что‐то подобное, вероятно, для него не станет проблемой устроить нападение со второго этажа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se o culpado usasse uma escada ou algo assim, provavelmente não seria impossível atacar de cima.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 若是有梯子之類的東西，那從二樓侵入也並非不可能。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 若是有梯子之类的东西，那从二楼侵入也并非不可能。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se il colpevole avesse usato una scala o qualcosa di simile, probabilmente gli sarebbe stato possibile attaccare dal secondo piano.

Steam (ST): But it wouldn't be easy for them to break those sturdy shutters from such an insecure position. The second floor was relatively safe compared to the first.
Umineko Project (UP): But it wouldn't be easy for them to break those sturdy shutters from such an unstable position. It was comparatively safer upstairs compared to downstairs.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But it wouldn't be easy for them to break those sturdy shutters from such an insecure position. The second floor was safe compared to the first.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、厳重な鎧戸をその不安定な足場から打ち破ることは、容易なことではない。２階は１階に比べて安全なのだ。
Russian (RU): Но ему будет довольно непросто пробить эти крепкие ставни, балансируя на скользкой почве. Второй этаж был значительно безопасней по сравнению с первым.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas não seria fácil quebrar aquelas venezianas robustas a partir de uma posição tão instável. O andar de cima era mais seguro comparado ao de baixo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，腳下不穩，是難以攻破封得死死的百葉窗的。二樓比一樓要安全。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，脚下不稳，是难以攻破封得死死的百叶窗的。二楼比一楼要安全。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma in una posizione così poco stabile non gli sarebbe stato facile rompere le imposte massicce. Il secondo piano era sicuro messo a confronto col primo.

Steam (ST): Battler and George had also wanted to remain on the first floor so that they could fight if the worst happened, but Eva had put a stop to that.
Umineko Project (UP): Battler and George had hoped to remain downstairs as well, to fight in the worst case scenario, but Eva had rejected that.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Battler and George had hoped they could also remain on the first floor, to fight in the worst case scenario, but Eva had rejected that.
PC Japanese (JP): 戦人や譲治は、自分たちも１階にいて、万一の際には戦いたいと希望したが、絵羽が一蹴した。
Russian (RU): Баттлер и Джордж надеялись, что им тоже позволят остаться на первом этаже, чтобы бороться в самом наихудшем случае, но Ева отказала им.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Battler e George esperavam poder permanecer no andar de baixo, para lutar na pior das hipóteses, mas Eva havia rejeitado isso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 戰人與讓治提出了，自己也待在一樓，想在有個萬一時參與戰鬥，不過，被繪羽斷然拒絕了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 战人与让治提出了，自己也待在一楼，想在有个万一时参与战斗，不过，被绘羽断然拒绝了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Battler e George avevano a loro volta sperato di poter restare al piano terra, per combattere nella peggiore dell'eventualità, ma Eva aveva rifiutato.

Steam (ST): In her mind, George was now the only member of her family. It seemed that she didn't even want to expose him to the danger of coming downstairs to the first floor.
Umineko Project (UP): In her mind, George was now her only family.{n}It seemed that she didn't even want to expose him to the danger of coming downstairs to the first floor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In her mind, George was now the only member of her family. It seemed that she didn't even want to expose him to the danger of coming downstairs to the first floor.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女にとって、譲治はもはや唯一の家族。１階に下りるという危険さえ冒させたくないらしい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 彼女にとって、譲治はもはや唯一の家族。{n}１階に下りるという危険さえ冒させたくないらしい。
Russian (RU): По её мнению, Джордж оставался теперь единственным членом её семьи.{n}Было похоже, что она даже не желает подвергать его риску нахождения на первом этаже.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Na mente dela, George agora era sua única família.{n}Parecia que ela não queria nem mesmo expô‐lo ao perigo de descer ao primeiro andar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對她來說，讓治已是唯一的家人。{n}似乎是連置身一樓的危險都不願他冒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对她来说，让治已是唯一的家人。{n}似乎是连置身一楼的危险都不愿他冒。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nella sua mente, adesso George era l'unico membro della sua famiglia. Apparentemente non voleva esporlo nemmeno al rischio di scendere al piano terra.

Steam (ST): Krauss and Natsuhi could understand that feeling.
Umineko Project (UP): Krauss and Natsuhi could also understand that feeling.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Krauss and Natsuhi could also understand that feeling.
PC Japanese (JP): その気持ちは、蔵臼夫妻にとっても理解できるものだった。
Russian (RU): Краусс и Нацухи также очень хорошо понимали эти чувства.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Krauss e Natsuhi também conseguiam entender esse sentimento.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 藏臼夫妻也很是理解她的這份心情。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 藏臼夫妻也很是理解她的这份心情。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche Krauss e Natsuhi potevano comprendere il suo stato d'animo.

Steam (ST): ...Also, a great deal of time had passed since the siege began.
Umineko Project (UP): ......A great deal of time had now passed since they once again barricaded themselves in.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Since this siege began, a great deal of time had passed.
PC Japanese (JP): ……そして、その篭城から、短くない時間が経過した。
Russian (RU): ......С тех пор, как началась эта осада, минуло уже довольно много времени.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Uma grande quantidade de tempo tinha se passado desde que eles se haviam se barricado mais uma vez.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……接著，從開始籠城起，經過了一段不短的時間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……接着，从开始笼城起，经过了一段不短的时间。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Era passato molto tempo dall'inizio dell'assedio.

Steam (ST): In the second floor cousins' room, Battler, George, and Jessica sat dazed... and didn't even listen to the TV that had been left on.
Umineko Project (UP): In the cousins' room upstairs, Battler, George, and Jessica were sitting dazed, their ears not even registering the TV that had been left on.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In the second floor cousins' room, Battler, George, and Jessica were dazed, and didn't even listen to the TV that had been left on.
PC Japanese (JP): ２階のいとこ部屋では、戦人と譲治と朱志香の３人が、付けっ放したテレビに耳も傾けず、ぼんやりと放心していた。
Russian (RU): В комнате для кузенов и кузин сидели впавшие в прострацию Баттлер, Джордж и Джессика, даже не слушавшие телевизор, оставленный включённым.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No quarto dos primos no andar de cima, Battler, George e Jessica estavam sentados, atordoados, com seus ouvidos nem ao menos registrando o que era dito na televisão que havia sido deixada ligada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在二樓堂兄妹房間中，戰人、讓治、朱志香三人，無視開著的電視，神情恍惚地發著呆。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在二楼堂兄妹房间中，战人、让治、朱志香三人，无视开着的电视，神情恍惚地发着呆。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nella stanza dei cugini al secondo piano, Battler, George, e Jessica erano intontiti, e non prestavano nemmeno attenzione alla TV che era stata lasciata accesa.

Steam (ST): For a while, Nanjo had been with them and had tried to lend them words of encouragement, but when he realized that he might actually be having the opposite effect, he hid himself in his own room on the same second floor.
Umineko Project (UP): For a while, Nanjo had been with them, and had tried to send them words to cheer them up, but when he realized that he might actually be having the opposite effect, he disappeared into his own upstairs room.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): For a while, Nanjo had been with them, and had tried to send them words of encouragement, but when he realized that he might actually be having the opposite effect, he had hid himself in his own room on the same second floor.
PC Japanese (JP): しばらくの間、南條も一緒にいてくれて、彼らを励ますような言葉を掛けてくれたのだが、それはむしろ逆効果かもしれないと気付き、同じ２階の自室に姿を消していた。
Russian (RU): Нанджо провёл какое‐то время вместе с ними, пытаясь подбодрить их словами поддержки, но когда понял, что может добиться совершенно противоположного эффекта, то укрылся в своей комнате на втором этаже.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por um momento, Nanjo tinha estado com eles, tentando dar palavras de ânimo, mas quando ele percebeu que isso podia na verdade estar tendo o efeito oposto, ele desapareceu em seu próprio quarto no andar de cima.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然有一段時間，南條也在陪著他們，鼓勵著他們，但注意到這或許會起到反效果後，他就回了二樓自己的房間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然有一段时间，南条也在陪着他们，鼓励着他们，但注意到这或许会起到反效果后，他就回了二楼自己的房间。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nanjo era stato con loro per un po' di tempo, e aveva cercato di offrirgli parole d'incoraggiamento, ma quando si era accorto che in realtà stava probabilmente ottenendo l'effetto contrario, si era eclissato nella sua stanza sempre al secondo piano.

Steam (ST): George kept looking dazedly at the photographs inserted in his notebook.
Umineko Project (UP): George kept looking dazedly at the photographs inserted in his notebook.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): George kept looking dazedly at the photographs inserted in his notebook.
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治は手帳に挟んでいた写真を、ずっとぼんやりと見続けている。
Russian (RU): Джордж в ступоре глядел на фотографии в своём фотоальбоме.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): George continuou olhando atordoado para as fotografias inseridas em seu pequeno caderno de bolso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 讓治一直呆呆地望著，夾在小冊子裡的照片。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 让治一直呆呆地望着，夹在小册子里的照片。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): George continuava a fissare le foto nel suo taccuino con aria inebetita.

Steam (ST): ...It was from the time he'd taken a vacation to Okinawa with Shannon.
Umineko Project (UP): ......They were from that time he had taken a vacation to Okinawa with Shannon.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......It was from that time he had taken a vacation to Okinawa with Shannon.
PC Japanese (JP): ……それは以前、紗音と一緒に行った、沖縄旅行の時のもの。
Russian (RU): ......Они были сделаны во время его отпуска на Окинаву вместе с Шаннон.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Elas eram daquele tempo em que ele tinha tirado férias em Okinawa junto com Shannon.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這是以前，他與紗音一起去沖繩旅行時拍的照。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这是以前，他与纱音一起去冲绳旅行时拍的照。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Erano di quella volta in cui era stato in vacanza ad Okinawa con Shannon.

Steam (ST): Shannon's happy smile was contained in those photos.
Umineko Project (UP): Shannon's happy smile was contained in those photographs.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Shannon's happy smile was contained in those photographs.
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音の楽しそうな笑顔が写真に収められている。
Russian (RU): Счастливая улыбка Шаннон была запечатлена на этих фотографиях.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O sorriso feliz de Shannon estava contido nessa fotografias.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 紗音高興的笑容印在了照片之中。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 纱音高兴的笑容印在了照片之中。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il sorriso felice di Shannon era catturato in quelle fotografie.

Steam (ST): ...George could remember the temperature and the humidity, the warmth and strength of the wind, and even what he had been talking about with her at the time those photos had been taken...as clearly as though it had been yesterday.
Umineko Project (UP): ......George could remember the temperature and the humidity, the warmth and strength of the wind, and even what he had been talking about with her at the time those photos had been taken, as clearly as though it had been yesterday.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......George could remember the temperature and the humidity, the warmth and strength of the wind, and even what he had been talking about with her at the time those photos had been taken as clearly as though it had been yesterday.
PC Japanese (JP): ……譲治には、それらの写真を撮った時の、気温や湿度、風の温かさや強さ、そしてどんな会話を彼女としていたかさえ、昨日のことのようにはっきりと思い出せた。
Russian (RU): ......Джордж помнил температуру и влажность, тепло и силу ветра, и даже то, что говорил ей в тот момент, когда снимал эти фотографии, так чётко, словно это было ещё вчера.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......George conseguia se lembrar da temperatura e da umidade, o calor e a força do vento, e até sobre o que ele estava falando com ela na hora que aquelas fotos tinham sido tiradas, tão claramente como se tivesse sido ontem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……如昨日之事般，讓治清楚地記起了，拍這些照片時的氣溫、濕度、風溫、風速，以及與她進行了怎樣的交談。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……如昨日之事般，让治清楚地记起了，拍这些照片时的气温、湿度、风温、风速，以及与她进行了怎样的交谈。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... George riusciva a ricordare la temperature e l'umidità, il calore e la forza del vento, e persino di cosa stavano parlando quando quelle foto erano state scattate chiaramente, come se fosse accaduto il giorno prima.

Steam (ST): So to George, they weren't simply photos, but a door to bring back warm memories...
Umineko Project (UP): So to George, they weren't simply photos, but a door to bring back warm memories...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So to George, they weren't simply photos, but a door to bring back warm memories...
PC Japanese (JP): だからそれは、単なる写真ではなく、譲治にとって、温かな記憶を蘇らせるための入り口でもある…。
Russian (RU): Поэтому для Джорджа это были не просто фотографии, а та дверь, которая возвращала те тёплые воспоминания...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, para George, elas não eram simplesmente fotos, mas uma porta para trazer de volta memórias calorosas...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，這不僅僅是照片，對讓治來說，它還是復甦溫暖記憶的入口…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，这不仅仅是照片，对让治来说，它还是复苏温暖记忆的入口…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi per George, quelle non erano semplici foto, ma una porta attraverso cui riportare indietro caldi ricordi...

Steam (ST): In this room, even though the sound of the typhoon and the TV should have entered George's hearing, ...it was the scenery of Okinawa he had seen with her and her laughing voice that reached his eyes and his ears...
Umineko Project (UP): In this room, even though the sound of the typhoon and the TV should have entered George's hearing, ......it was the scenery of Okinawa he had seen with her, and her laughing voice, that reached his eyes and his ears...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In this room, even though the sound of the typhoon and the TV should have entered George's hearing, ......it was the scenery of Okinawa he had seen with her and her laughing voice that reached his eyes and his ears...
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治は確かに今、この部屋で台風の音とテレビの音を耳にしているはずなのに、……彼女と過ごした沖縄の風景と彼女の笑い声を、目にし耳にしている…。
Russian (RU): И хотя звуки тайфуна и телевизора в этой комнате отдавались в ушах Джорджа... Глаза его видели пейзаж Окинавы, а уши слышали её смеющийся голос...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Neste quarto, mesmo que o som do tufão e da televisão passassem pela audição de George, ......era o cenário de Okinawa que ele tinha visto com ela, e a voz risonha dela, que alcançavam seus olhos e ouvidos...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 讓治此刻的確是在這房間之中，聽著台風與電視機的聲音，……但他的眼前卻展開著與她共覽的沖繩美景，耳中注滿了她的笑聲…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 让治此刻的确是在这房间之中，听着台风与电视机的声音，……但他的眼前却展开着与她共览的冲绳美景，耳中注满了她的笑声…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In questa stanza, il rumore del tifone e la TV avrebbero dovuto invadere il campo uditivo di George... ma era il paesaggio di Okinawa che aveva visto con lei e la sua voce ridente che gli riempivano gli occhi e le orecchie...

Steam (ST): George had strived to be reborn after meeting Shannon.
Umineko Project (UP): After meeting Shannon, George had made the decision to be reborn.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): George had strived to be reborn after meeting Shannon.
PC Japanese (JP): 譲治は、紗音と出会ったことで、生まれ変わろうと決意した。
Russian (RU): Джордж дал себе слово измениться после встречи с Шаннон.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Depois de conhecer Shannon, George tinha tomado a decisão de renascer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 讓治通過與紗音相戀，從而下定決心，重新做人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 让治通过与纱音相恋，从而下定决心，重新做人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): George aveva fatto del suo meglio per rinascere dopo aver incontrato Shannon.

Steam (ST): He had sworn to separate himself from the timid person he had once been, easily caught up in the atmosphere, unable to refuse a request, and easily used by those around him.
Umineko Project (UP): He had sworn to separate himself from the timid person he had once been: easily caught up in the atmosphere, unable to refuse a request, and easily used by those around him.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He had sworn to separate himself from the timid person he had once been, easily caught up in the atmosphere, unable to refuse a request, and easily used by those around him.
PC Japanese (JP): 雰囲気に押し流されやすくて、頼まれると断れず、都合よく周りに使われてしまう気弱な自分と決別しようと誓った。
Russian (RU): Он поклялся перестать быть тем робким человеком, которым когда то был, легко попадающим под влияние стихии, не умеющим отказывать в просьбах и которого было легко использовать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele havia jurado separar‐se da pessoa tímida que ele tinha sido uma vez: facilmente pego no clima, incapaz de recusar um pedido, e facilmente manipulado por aqueles à sua volta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 發誓要與易受氣氛擺佈，不會拒絕請求，老被身邊之人趁機利用的懦弱的自己訣別。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 发誓要与易受气氛摆布，不会拒绝请求，老被身边之人趁机利用的懦弱的自己诀别。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Aveva giurato di staccarsi dalla persona mite che era stato, una persona facilmente influenzata dall'ambiente circostante, incapace di rifiutare un favore a qualcuno, e facilmente usata da chi gli era intorno.

Steam (ST): ...He had resolved himself to become a strong man who could make her life more joyous.
Umineko Project (UP): ......He had resolved himself to become a strong man who would make her life even more joyous.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……彼女の人生を、より幸福にするために、強い男になろうと決心したのだ。
Russian (RU): ......Он сам решил стать более сильным человеком, который сделает её жизнь ещё счастливее.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ele tinha resolvido transformar‐se em um homem forte que deixaria a vida dela ainda mais alegre.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……決心成為，讓她的人生過得更幸福的，堅強的男人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……决心成为，让她的人生过得更幸福的，坚强的男人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Si era deciso a diventare un uomo forte che avrebbe reso la vita di lei ancora più colma di gioia.

Steam (ST): Therefore. ...If he hadn't met Shannon, ...the man called Ushiromiya George would probably have lived a very different life.
Umineko Project (UP): So. ...If he hadn't met Shannon, ......the man called Ushiromiya George would probably have lived a very different life.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Therefore. ...If he hadn't met Shannon, ......the man called Ushiromiya George would probably have lived a very different life.
PC Japanese (JP): だから。…もしも紗音との出会いがなかったなら、……右代宮譲治という男は、もっと別の、異なった人生を送っていただろう。
Russian (RU): Поэтому, если бы он не встретил Шаннон... Человек по имени Уширомия Джордж, наверное, жил бы совершенно другой жизнью.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Logo, ...se ele não tivesse conhecido Shannon, ......o homem chamado Ushiromiya George provavelmente teria vivido uma vida muito diferente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以。…如果沒有與紗音相戀的話，……名叫右代宮讓治的男人，會過上與此不同的，別的人生吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以。…如果没有与纱音相恋的话，……名叫右代宫让治的男人，会过上与此不同的，别的人生吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perciò. ... Se non avesse incontrato Shannon... l'uomo chiamato George Ushiromiya avrebbe, con ogni probabilità, vissuto una vita molto diversa.

Steam (ST): And the George of that different life surely wouldn't have been as excellent a man as he is now.
Umineko Project (UP): And the George of that different life surely wouldn't have been as excellent a man as he now was.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And the George of that different life surely wouldn't have been as excellent a man as he is now.
PC Japanese (JP): そしてその人生における彼は、今の彼ほど立派な男ではなかったに違いない。
Russian (RU): И Джордж из другой жизни определённо не был бы таким же отличным парнем, каким он является сейчас.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E o George daquela outra vida com certeza não teria sido um homem tão excelente quanto ele era agora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 並且，過上了這種人生的他，無疑是不會成為如現在的他這般出色的男性的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 并且，过上了这种人生的他，无疑是不会成为如现在的他这般出色的男性的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E il George di quella vita diversa di certo non sarebbe stato un uomo ammirevole come lo era adesso.

Steam (ST): The person I am now exists for Shannon's sake... ...Now that Shannon is gone, ...why do I exist?
Umineko Project (UP): The way he was now, he was for the sake of Shannon. ......But if that same Shannon was now gone, ...he found himself wondering why he exists.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even though I now exist for Shannon's sake.......Even so, now that Shannon is gone, ...why do I exist?
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音のために、今の自分がいるのに。……なのに、その紗音がいなくなったなら、…自分はなぜいるのか。
Russian (RU): Даже если сейчас я всё ещё живу ради Шаннон... ......Даже когда Шаннон больше нет... зачем я живу?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Foi por causa de Shannon que ele mudou. ......Mas, como essa mesma Shannon estava morta agora, ...ele perguntava‐se o por que de sua própria existência.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因為紗音，才有了現在的自己。……可是，既然連紗音都不在了，…那自己又是為何而存在的呢？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因为纱音，才有了现在的自己。……可是，既然连纱音都不在了，…那自己又是为何而存在的呢？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche se è grazie a Shannon che sono qui. ... Nonostante questo, ora che Shannon se n'è andata... perché esisto?

Steam (ST): It's completely meaningless, isn't it?
Umineko Project (UP): Isn't it completely meaningless?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It's completely meaningless, isn't it?
PC Japanese (JP): 何の意味もないのではないか。
Russian (RU): Это ведь совершенно бессмысленно, разве не так?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso não é completamente insignificante?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這不是根本沒有任何意義嗎？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这不是根本没有任何意义吗？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non ha alcun senso, vero?

Steam (ST): ...He felt a deep, deep sadness, as though he himself had become empty.
Umineko Project (UP): ...A deep, deep sadness, as though he himself had become empty.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …自分自身が空虚になってしまうような、深い深い悲しみ。
Russian (RU): ...Глубокая, глубокая пустота, словно его самого опустошили.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Uma profunda, profunda tristeza, como se ele tivesse ficado vazio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …這是掏空自身存在的深邃悲傷。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …这是掏空自身存在的深邃悲伤。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Una profondissima tristezza, come se dentro fosse rimasto completamente svuotato.

Steam (ST): That feeling must have been tormenting him this whole time. ...However, until Battler mentioned it, he hadn't been aware of the feeling himself.
Umineko Project (UP): That feeling had tormented him the whole time. ......However, until Battler had told him, he hadn't been aware of the feeling himself.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That feeling should have tormented him the whole time. ......However, until Battler had told him, he hadn't been aware of the feeling himself.
PC Japanese (JP): その気持ちは、ずっと彼を苛んでいたはずだ。　……しかし、戦人にさっき言われるまで、自覚できずにいた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その気持ちは、ずっと彼を苛んでいたはずだ。……しかし、戦人にさっき言われるまで、自覚できずにいた。
Russian (RU): Эти чувства, должно быть, мучили его всё это время. ......Однако пока Баттлер не сказал ему, он и сам не подозревал о них.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Esse sentimento tinha atormentado‐o o tempo todo. ......Porém, até Battler ter dito isso a ele, ele mesmo não tinha estado ciente do sentimento.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他明明一直遭受著這份哀傷的折磨。……但直至剛才戰人說出口前，他都沒有這個自覺。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他明明一直遭受着这份哀伤的折磨。……但直至刚才战人说出口前，他都没有这个自觉。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questa sensazione avrebbe dovuto tormentarlo senza sosta. ... Eppure, fino a che Battler non gliel'aveva fatto notare, non si era affatto accorto di sentirsi così.

Steam (ST): ...He'd finally managed to remember...that it should have been all right for him to cry much, much more.
Umineko Project (UP): ......He finally remembered...that he should have cried much, much more.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......He finally remembered, ...that he should have cried much, much more.
PC Japanese (JP): ……自分は、もっともっと泣いても良かったんだって、…やっと思い出せたのだ。
Russian (RU): ......Он, наконец, вспомнил, что должен был плакать больше, гораздо больше.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ele finalmente lembrou...que devia ter chorado muito, muito mais.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……戰人的話終於令他想到了，自己可以去多多地，…哭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……战人的话终于令他想到了，自己可以去多多地，…哭。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Finalmente ricordò... che avrebbe dovuto piangere molto, molto di più.

Steam (ST): So he cried. Just like Battler had, he cried himself dry.
Umineko Project (UP): So he had cried. Just like Battler, he had cried himself dry.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So he cried. Just like Battler had, he had cried himself dry.
PC Japanese (JP): だから泣いた。彼がそうするように、自分も枯れるまで涙を流した。
Russian (RU): Поэтому он плакал. Так же как и Баттлер, он выплакался досуха.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, ele chorou. Assim como Battler, chorou até secar as lágrimas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以哭了。就像戰人那樣，自己也將眼淚傾瀉至枯竭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以哭了。就像战人那样，自己也将眼泪倾泻至枯竭。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perciò aveva pianto. Proprio come aveva fatto Battler, aveva pianto fino ad esaurire le lacrime.

Steam (ST): ...By now, his eyes were bright red and swollen, and he couldn't cry any more. So George did his best to change his way of thinking.
Umineko Project (UP): ......By now, his eyes were bright red and swollen, and he could not cry any more. So George did his best to change his way of thinking.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……今はもう、目が真っ赤に腫れ上がり、それ以上の涙は零せない。だから譲治はがんばって思考を変えようと思った。
Russian (RU): ......К этому времени его глаза были ярко красными и опухшими, и он не мог плакать. Поэтому Джордж сделал всё, чтобы направить мысли в другое русло.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Agora, seus olhos estavam inchados e profundamente avermelhados, e ele não conseguia mais chorar. Então, George fez o seu melhor para mudar sua forma de pensar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……此刻，眼睛已又紅又腫，再也無法流出眼淚。所以，讓治想到了，努力轉變思考方式。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……此刻，眼睛已又红又肿，再也无法流出眼泪。所以，让治想到了，努力转变思考方式。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Adesso, i suoi occhi erano di un rosso vivo e gonfi, e non era più in grado di versare altre lacrime. Così George stava facendo del suo meglio per cambiare la sua linea di pensiero.

Steam (ST): He was not meaningless now, ...and he should be grateful to Shannon for giving him such a character.
Umineko Project (UP): He decided to think that he was not meaningless, ...that he should be grateful to Shannon for giving him such a character.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He was not meaningless now, ...and he should be grateful that Shannon had given him such a character.
PC Japanese (JP): 今の自分は無意味なのではなく、…紗音にこんな自分を与えてくれたことに感謝しようと思った。
Russian (RU): Он больше не был опустошён... И был благодарен Шаннон за то, что она воспитала в нём такой характер.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele decidiu pensar que ele não era insignificante, ...que ele devia ser grato a Shannon por ter lhe dado tal caráter.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 想到了現在的自己並非毫無意義，…得感謝紗音，給予了這樣的自己。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 想到了现在的自己并非毫无意义，…得感谢纱音，给予了这样的自己。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La sua esistenza non era inutile ora... e doveva essere grato che Shannon gli avesse donato questa personalità.

Steam (ST): The dead don't come back to life. He would have to get over being separated from his most beloved person.
Umineko Project (UP): Dead lives are not revived. He would have to get over being separated from his beloved.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Dead lives are not revived. He would have to get over being separated from his most beloved person.
PC Japanese (JP): 死んだ命は蘇らない。最愛の人との別れを、彼は乗り越えなくてはならない。
Russian (RU): Мёртвых не вернуть к жизни. Ему придётся пережить расставание со своим самым любимым человеком.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As vidas que foram perdidas não podem mais retornar.{n}Ele teria que superar a separação de sua amada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 死去的生命無法復甦。他必須熬過，與最愛之人的離別。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 死去的生命无法复苏。他必须熬过，与最爱之人的离别。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le foglie morte non tornano in vita. Doveva superare il dolore di essere separato dalla persona che più amava.

Steam (ST): If he were to chase after Shannon and kill himself, she would surely be deeply dejected.
Umineko Project (UP): If he were to come after Shannon by killing himself, she would surely be deeply dejected.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If he were to chase after Shannon and kill himself, she would surely be deeply dejected.
PC Japanese (JP): 自分が紗音の後を追って自殺するようなことがあったなら、彼女はきっと深く落胆するだろう。
Russian (RU): Если бы он решил последовать за Шаннон и покончил с собой, она несомненно была бы очень опечалена.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se ele fosse seguir Shannon, cometendo suicídio, ela com certeza ficaria terrivelmente abatida.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 若是自己追隨紗音而去的話，她一定會感到深深的沮喪的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 若是自己追随纱音而去的话，她一定会感到深深的沮丧的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se avesse seguito Shannon e si fosse ucciso, senza dubbio lei ne sarebbe stata molto triste.

Steam (ST): ...It worked the other way around, too. If he had died, and Shannon had chased after him, throwing away her own life, he wouldn't have been able to forgive himself.
Umineko Project (UP): ......It would be the same the other way around, too. If he died, and Shannon chased after him, throwing away her own life, he wouldn't be able to forgive himself.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......It worked the other way around, too. If he had died, and Shannon had chased after him, throwing away her own life, he wouldn't have been able to forgive it himself.
PC Japanese (JP): ……逆だって同じだ。自分が死に、それを追って紗音が自ら命を捨てるようなことがあったなら、自分で自分が許せなくなってしまう。
Russian (RU): ......Верным было и обратное. Если бы он умер, а Шаннон последовала бы за ним, лишая себя собственной жизни, он не смог бы простить себя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Seria do mesmo jeito caso fosse o contrário. Se ele morresse, e Shannon seguisse atrás dele, jogando fora sua própria vida, ele não seria capaz de se perdoar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……反之也是一樣。若是自己死後，紗音也選擇跟著捨棄性命的話，那連自己都會饒不了自己的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……反之也是一样。若是自己死后，纱音也选择跟着舍弃性命的话，那连自己都会饶不了自己的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E viceversa. Se fosse morto, e Shannon l'avesse seguito, gettando via la sua vita, nemmeno lui sarebbe stato in grado di perdonare quel gesto.

Steam (ST): ...So he chose to surpass his sadness and anger... ...and decided to thank her instead.
Umineko Project (UP): ......So he chose to surpass his emotions of sadness and anger, .........and decided to thank her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......So he had chosen to surpass his emotions of sadness and anger, .........and had decided to thank her.
PC Japanese (JP): ……だから彼は、悲しんだり、怒ったりする感情をはるかに超越して、………感謝することにしたのだ。
Russian (RU): ......Поэтому он решил преодолеть все свои эмоции гнева и печали... И поблагодарить её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Por isso, ele escolheu superar suas emoções de tristeza e raiva, .........e decidiu agradecê‐la.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……所以，他遠遠超越了悲傷、憤怒之情，………選擇了心懷感謝。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……所以，他远远超越了悲伤、愤怒之情，………选择了心怀感谢。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Per questa ragione aveva deciso di muovere oltre la sua tristezza e la sua rabbia... e aveva deciso di ringraziarla.

Steam (ST): After meeting Shannon, she made his days rich and full... and taught him the meaning of working hard for other people's sakes.
Umineko Project (UP): Meeting Shannon had made his days rich and full, ...and had taught him the meaning of working hard for other people's sakes.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He had met with Shannon, who had made his days rich and full, ...and who had taught him the meaning of working hard for other people's sakes.
PC Japanese (JP): 紗音と出会え、豊かな日々を与えてくれて、…そして自分に、人のために努力することの意味を教えてくれた。
Russian (RU): Он повстречал Шаннон, сделавшую его дни богатыми и насыщенными и научившую его прилагать все усилия на благо других людей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Conhecer Shannon tinha deixado os dias dele mais ricos e alegres, ...e tinha lhe ensinado o significado de trabalhar duro pelo bem de outras pessoas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 與紗音的相戀，不僅給予了自己一段豐富多彩的日子，…也教給了自己，為他人努力的意義。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 与纱音的相恋，不仅给予了自己一段丰富多彩的日子，…也教给了自己，为他人努力的意义。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Aveva incontrato Shannon, che aveva reso i suoi giorni preziosi e li aveva riempiti... e che gli aveva insegnato cosa significasse lavorare sodo per il bene altrui.

Steam (ST): As a result, she had shaped him into the kind of person he had wanted to be. ...He wanted to thank her for that.
Umineko Project (UP): As a result, she had shaped him into the person he had wanted to be.{n}...He thought he should thank her for that.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As a result, she had shaped him into the person he had admired....He thought he should thank her for that.
PC Japanese (JP): その結果、自分の憧れた姿の自分を与えてくれた。…それに感謝しようと思った。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その結果、自分の憧れた姿の自分を与えてくれた。{n}…それに感謝しようと思った。
Russian (RU): И в результате она придала ему форму того человека, которым он восхищался.{n}...Он подумал, что ему следует быть благодарным ей за это.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como resultado, ela tinha moldado‐o na pessoa que ele queria ser.{n}Ele pensou que devia agradecê‐la por isso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 其結果，給予了自身所憧憬的自己。{n}…所以，他想到了，為此感謝她。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 其结果，给予了自身所憧憬的自己。{n}…所以，他想到了，为此感谢她。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A conti fatti, lei l'aveva modellato nel tipo di persona che lui ammirava. ... Credeva di doverla ringraziare per questo.

Steam (ST): He tried to quell his sadness in this way, but each time he did, he remembered Shannon's smile...
Umineko Project (UP): By doing that, he tried to quell his sadness.{n}But each time he did, he remembered Shannon's smile...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): By doing that, he tried to quell his sadness. But each time he did, he remembered Shannon's face...
PC Japanese (JP): そうすることで、悲しみを和らげようとしたのだ。でもその度に、彼女の笑顔が蘇ってしまう…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そうすることで、悲しみを和らげようとしたのだ。{n}でもその度に、彼女の笑顔が蘇ってしまう…。
Russian (RU): Делая это, он пытался подавить свою грусть.{n}Но каждый раз, когда он это делал, он вспоминал лицо Шаннон...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Fazendo isso, ele tentou saciar sua tristeza.{n}Mas cada vez que ele o fazia, se lembrava do sorriso de Shannon...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他通過這麼想來緩解悲傷。{n}可是每次這麼想時，腦中都會再度浮現起她的笑容…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他通过这么想来缓解悲伤。{n}可是每次这么想时，脑中都会再度浮现起她的笑容…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Così facendo, cercava di reprimere la sua tristezza. Ma ogni volta che ci provava, ricordava il volto di Shannon...

Steam (ST): ......He understood it logically.
Umineko Project (UP): .........He knew it, logically.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): .........He understood the reasoning.
PC Japanese (JP): ………理屈ではわかってる。
Russian (RU): .........Он понимал причину.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Ele entendia isso, logicamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………道理是明白的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Razionalmente, lui capiva.

Steam (ST): He knew that grieving any more than this would only make her grieve in heaven, ...but that didn't bring a stop to his sadness...
Umineko Project (UP): He understood that grieving any more than this would only make her grieve in heaven, ......yet he couldn't stop his sadness...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even though he understood that grieving any more than this would only make her grieve in heaven, ......he couldn't stop his sadness...
PC Japanese (JP): これ以上、悲しむことは、むしろ天国の彼女を悲しませてしまうだけだと理解しているのに、……悲しみを止められないのだ…。
Russian (RU): И хотя он понимал, что своей скорбью лишь заставит её грустить на небесах, он не мог унять свою печаль...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele entendia que lamentar ainda mais que isto apenas a faria lamentar‐se no céu, ......ainda assim ele não conseguia parar sua tristeza...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 明明知道，再繼續傷心下去，只會反而讓身在天國的她感到悲傷，……但就是止不住心中的哀傷…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 明明知道，再继续伤心下去，只会反而让身在天国的她感到悲伤，……但就是止不住心中的哀伤…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Pur capendo che addolorarsi più di quanto avesse già fatto avrebbe solo procurato dolore a lei in paradiso... non riusciva a bloccare la sua tristezza...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "Why is it... ...that when people die... it's so sad like this...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Why.........does people dying......make us this sad..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Why is it, .........that when people die, ......it's so sad like this..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「何で、………人が死ぬってのはよ、……こんなに悲しいんだろうな…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「何で、………人が死ぬってのはよ、……こんなに悲しいんだろうな…」
Russian (RU): "Почему же... когда люди умирают... становится так невыносимо грустно..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Por que.........a morte das pessoas......nos deixa tão tristes assim...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「為什麼，………人之死，……是此等的悲傷啊…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「为什么，………人之死，……是此等的悲伤啊…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Perché... è così triste... quando le persone muoiono..."

Steam (ST): Battler muttered. ...It was as though he was speaking on behalf of all humans.
Umineko Project (UP): Battler muttered.{n}...It was as though he was speaking on behalf of all humans.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Battler muttered....It was as though he was speaking on behalf of all humans.
PC Japanese (JP): 戦人がぽつりと呟く。…それは、全ての人間を代弁するかのようだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 戦人がぽつりと呟く。{n}…それは、全ての人間を代弁するかのようだった。
Russian (RU): Пробормотал Баттлер.{n}...Он словно спрашивал от имени всех людей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Battler murmurou.{n}...Era como se ele estivesse falando em nome de todos os humanos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 戰人嘟噥了一句。{n}…這句話如同代言了所有人的心聲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 战人嘟哝了一句。{n}…这句话如同代言了所有人的心声。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mormorò Battler. ... Era come se avesse parlato a nome di tutto il genere umano.

Steam (ST): His question probably hadn't been directed at anyone, but Jessica answered.
Umineko Project (UP): He probably hadn't been asking anyone, but Jessica answered.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He probably hadn't been asking anyone, but Jessica answered.
PC Japanese (JP): それは誰に問い掛けたものでもなかったろうが、朱志香が答えた。
Russian (RU): Возможно, он ни к кому конкретно не обращался, но Джессика ответила.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele provavelmente não estava perguntando a ninguém, mas Jessica respondeu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然這並不是在問誰，但朱志香回答了他的話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然这并不是在问谁，但朱志香回答了他的话。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Con ogni probabilità non aveva rivolto la domanda a nessuno in particolare, ma Jessica rispose.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): "...It's always sad when you have to say goodbye.
Umineko Project (UP): "......Partings are always sad, no matter what they're like."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......No matter how you say your farewell, it's always sad.
PC Japanese (JP): 「……別れはどんな形でも、いつも悲しいさ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……別れはどんな形でも、いつも悲しいさ」
Russian (RU): "......Какие бы слова прощания ты ни говорил, это всегда печально."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Despedidas sempre são tristes, não importa como sejam."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……不管哪種形式的離別，都是很悲傷的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……不管哪种形式的离别，都是很悲伤的。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... In qualsiasi modo tu debba dire addio, è sempre una cosa triste.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): ...But when the person's old or there's some time, ...when you know beforehand that it's coming, sooner or later, that sadness gets spread out over a long period of time. ...When misfortune comes suddenly, it's sad...because you don't even get that time..."
Umineko Project (UP): "...But, when, for example, the person is old, or there's some time it's going to happen, ...when it's expected in advance, and you know it's a farewell that must come sooner or later, ...you can spend a long time softening the blow of that sadness. ......Sudden misfortune is probably sad...because you aren't allowed even that..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...But, when, for example, the person is old, or there's some time, ...when it's expected in advance, and you know it's a farewell that must come sooner or later, that sadness can grow fainter over a long period of time. ......Sudden misfortune is probably sad, ...because you aren't allowed even that..."
PC Japanese (JP): …でもそれが、例えば老いであるとか、何かの時間であるとか、…予め約束されていて、いつか訪れる別れであるとわかっているものは、…その悲しみを、長い時間を掛けて予め薄めておくことができる。……それを許されないから、…突然の不幸は、悲しいんだろうよ…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…でもそれが、例えば老いであるとか、何かの時間であるとか、…予め約束されていて、いつか訪れる別れであるとわかっているものは、…その悲しみを、長い時間を掛けて予め薄めておくことができる。……それを許されないから、…突然の不幸は、悲しいんだろうよ…」
Russian (RU): "...Но когда, к примеру, человек уже стар или имеется некоторое время... Когда этого ожидают заранее, и ты знаешь, что это прощание, наступит рано или поздно, такая печаль может значительно поутихнуть по прошествии долгого времени. ......Печаль внезапной трагедии, наверное... в том, что ты оказываешься лишён даже такой возможности..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Mas quando, por exemplo, a pessoa é idosa ou tem pouco tempo de vida, ...quando você sabe de antemão que ela vai morrer mais cedo ou mais tarde,{n}...a tristeza se dilui por um longo período. ......É triste quando a desgraça chega sem avisar...porque você não teve tempo para se preparar..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…但是，像是年老，或是有什麼時間的，…事先知道早晚注定要迎來離別的情況，…可以在事前通過很長的時間來稀釋這份悲傷。……正因毫無準備，…所以突然的不幸才會很令人傷心…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…但是，像是年老，或是有什么时间的，…事先知道早晚注定要迎来离别的情况，…可以在事前通过很长的时间来稀释这份悲伤。……正因毫无准备，…所以突然的不幸才会很令人伤心…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma quando, per esempio, una persona è vecchia, oppure c'è un po' di tempo... quando già ce lo si aspetta, e tu sai che si tratta di un addio che prima o poi dovrà arrivare, quella tristezza può dissolversi dopo molto tempo. ... Probabilmente le disgrazie improvvise sono tristi... perché non ti è nemmeno concesso quello..."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "......I see. So, if they get sick or something and end up bedridden in a hospital, you might be able to ready yourself for it bit by bit, ...but when it happens suddenly someday, you don't get that luxury."
Umineko Project (UP): "...............I see, yeah. ...Sure, if they get sick or something, and end up bedridden in a hospital for several years, you might be able to ready yourself for it bit by bit, ...but when it happens suddenly some day, you don't have that much time."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "............I see. So, if they get sick or something, and end up bedridden in a hospital, you might be able to ready yourself for it bit by bit, ...but when it happens suddenly on some day, you don't have that much free time."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……………なるほどな。…そりゃ、病気にでも掛かって、病院で寝たきりになってりゃ、少しずつ心の整理もついてくだろうけど、…ある日突然じゃ、その暇もねぇもんな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……………なるほどな。…そりゃ、病気にでも掛かって、何年も昏睡状態になってりゃ、少しずつ心の整理もついてくだろうけど、…ある日突然じゃ、その暇もねぇもんな」
Russian (RU): "............Я понял. Значит, если они заболеют или ещё что‐нибудь в этом роде и в итоге окажутся в больнице, ты сможешь постепенно свыкнуться с этим. Но если это неожиданно произойдёт в один непрекрасный день, столько свободного времени у тебя не окажется."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...............Entendo. ...Assim, se a pessoa adoecer ou algo do tipo, e acabar na cama de um hospital por vários anos, você pode ser capaz de preparar‐se para o que virá, pouco a pouco, ...mas quando isso acontece repentinamente você não tem esse tempo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……………原來如此啊。…說來，如果換做生病，在醫院裡臥床不起的話，那還可以一點點地整理好心緒吧，…但換成在某一天突然到來，就根本沒這工夫了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……………原来如此啊。…说来，如果换做生病，在医院里卧床不起的话，那还可以一点点地整理好心绪吧，…但换成在某一天突然到来，就根本没这工夫了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Capisco. Dunque, se una persona si ammala, e finisce allettata in ospedale, è possibile che tu riesca a prepararti mentalmente a poco a poco... ma quando succede all'improvviso in un giorno qualsiasi, non hai molto tempo per farlo."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): "...The sadness that's usually spread out over several years...closes in on you all at once. ......That's pretty tough. ...Sometimes, it makes you feel a sadness so deep, it can leave scars for life..."
Umineko Project (UP): "...The sadness which you should normally spend several years softening closes in on you all at once. .........No wonder it's tough. ......Sometimes, it might even cause a sadness great enough to leave a scar for life..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...The sadness which normally should grow weaker over a period of several years closes in on you all at once. .........That's pretty tough. ......Sometimes, it might even cause a great sadness that leaves a scar for life..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…本来なら、数年を掛けて薄めるべき悲しみが、一度に押し寄せる。………そりゃあ辛いわけさ。……時には、人の生涯に傷を残すほど、深い悲しみを与えることも、あるかもしれない…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…本来なら、数年を掛けて薄めるべき悲しみが、一度に押し寄せる。………そりゃあ辛いわけさ。……時には、人の生涯に傷を残すほど、深い悲しみを与えることも、あるかもしれない…」
Russian (RU): "...Печаль, которой полагается стихать по прошествии нескольких лет, в один миг обрушивается на тебя. .........Это очень тяжело. ......Иногда это даже приводит к большей печали, оставляющей шрамы на всю жизнь..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...A tristeza que normalmente se diluiria por vários anos, cai sobre você de uma vez só. .........Não é de admirar que seja difícil. ......Às vezes, isso pode até mesmo causar uma tristeza grande o bastante para deixar uma cicatriz pelo resto da vida..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…本該靠花費數年來慢慢稀釋的悲傷，一口氣撲了上來。………那倒是會很難熬哦。……有時甚至會帶來，能令人留下終生傷痕的深深悲傷，這也不無可能…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…本该靠花费数年来慢慢稀释的悲伤，一口气扑了上来。………那倒是会很难熬哦。……有时甚至会带来，能令人留下终生伤痕的深深悲伤，这也不无可能…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... La tristezza che di norma si indebolisce dopo diversi anni ti assale tutto a un tratto. ... È una cosa difficile da affrontare. ... Talvolta, può anche causare una tale tristezza da lasciarti cicatrici che durano tutta la vita..."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "...Scars for life, huh?"
Umineko Project (UP): "......Enough to leave a scar for life, ...you say."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……生涯に傷を残すほど、…か。」
Russian (RU): "......Оставляет шрамы на всю жизнь... говоришь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......O bastante para deixar uma cicatriz pelo resto da vida, ...é?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……深到能留下終生的傷痕，…嗎。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……深到能留下终生的伤痕，…吗。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Da lasciarti cicatrici che durano una vita... dici."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): "...Like Grandfather's occult hobby. People say that's what caused it. ...That {f:5:Beatrice}, his mistress, died a long time ago, and he was so sad that he couldn't pull himself together.
Umineko Project (UP): "......It's like Grandfather's occult hobby. That was what they whispered about it. ......That maybe {f:5:Beatrice} was his lover, who died a long time ago, and he was so sad that he couldn't pull himself together."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......It's like Grandfather's occult hobby. People whisper about it. ......That Beatrice was his mistress, who died a long time ago, and he was so sad that he couldn't pull himself together.
PC Japanese (JP): 「……祖父さまのオカルト趣味もさ。そう囁かれてたんだよな。……例のベアトリーチェって愛人を大昔に亡くして、それが悲しくて悲しくて立ち直れなくて。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……祖父さまのオカルト趣味もさ。そう囁かれてたんだよな。……例のベアトリーチェって愛人を大昔に亡くして、それが悲しくて悲しくて立ち直れなくて」
Russian (RU): "......Это наподобие оккультного хобби дедушки. Люди шептались об этом. ......Что {f:5:Беатриче} была его давно умершей любовницей, и ему стало так грустно, что он не смог смириться с этим."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......É como o passatempo ocultista do vovô. Isso foi o que sussurraram sobre ele. ......Que talvez a {f:5:Beatrice} fosse a amante dele que morreu muito tempo atrás, e ele ficou tão triste que não conseguiu se recompor."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……還有，關於爺爺那神秘學興趣。私下裡都是這麼傳的吧。……說那會不會是，因為很久以前，那位名叫貝阿朵莉切的情人的去世，爺爺傷心地無法重新振作起來。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……还有，关于爷爷那神秘学兴趣。私下里都是这么传的吧。……说那会不会是，因为很久以前，那位名叫贝阿朵莉切的情人的去世，爷爷伤心地无法重新振作起来。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... È lo stesso per la passione che il Nonno ha per l'occulto. Le persone mormorano. ... Che Beatrice fosse stata la sua amante, morta tanto tempo fa, e che lui fosse così addolorato da non potersi riprendere.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): ...Some people whisper... that this is why he started sacrificing the rest of his life to occult research, in order to revive the dead."
Umineko Project (UP): "......And that's why he started sacrificing the rest of his life to research of the occult, in order to revive the dead. ......That's what they said."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Some people whisper, ......that this is why he started sacrificing the rest of his life to research of the occult, in order to revive the dead."
PC Japanese (JP): ……それで死者を蘇らせるためのオカルトの研究に残りの人生を全て捧げるようになったのではないかって。……そう囁かれてた。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……それで死者を蘇らせるためのオカルトの研究に残りの人生を全て捧げるようになったのではないかって。……そう囁かれてた」

Umineko Project (UP): However, ......in that moment, all of that time he had sacrificed for his research must have been rewarded. ...Even though he spent decades to gain it, that small amount of time must have been enough to reward him.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, ......in that moment, all of that time he had sacrificed for his research should have been rewarded....Even though he spent dozens of years to gain it, that small amount of time was probably enough to reward him.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、……その瞬間に彼が研究に捧げた月日は、全て報われたはずだ。…数十年の月日を掛けて得た、そのわずかな時間で、十分に彼の心は報われたはずだ。
Russian (RU): Однако... В тот момент всё то время, что он пожертвовал на свои исследования, должно было быть вознаграждено. ...Хотя он и посвятил десятки лет тому, стремясь преуспеть в этом, лишь этого недолгого времени, возможно, было достаточно, чтобы вознаградить его.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, ......naquele momento, todo o tempo que ele sacrificou para sua pesquisa deve ter sido recompensado. ...Mesmo que ele tenha gasto décadas para ganhá‐la, aquela pequena quantia de tempo deve ter sido o suficiente para recompensá‐lo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，……在那一瞬間，他為研究所獻上的歲月，應該全都得到了回報。…花費數十年所得的，短短的時間，應該充分地回報了他的心。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，……在那一瞬间，他为研究所献上的岁月，应该全都得到了回报。…花费数十年所得的，短短的时间，应该充分地回报了他的心。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ad ogni modo... in quell'istante, tutto il tempo che aveva sacrificato studiando era stato ricompensato. ... Nonostante avesse speso anni e anni per guadagnarlo, quel briciolo di tempo era stato probabilmente sufficiente a ricompensarlo.

Steam (ST): Until today, I never believed in the occult or magic or anything. Somewhere in my heart, ...I even made fun of Grandfather's research, thinking of it as nothing more than a pastime.
Umineko Project (UP): Until today, I never believed in the occult or magic or anything.{n}Somewhere in my heart, ...I even made fun of Grandfather's research as nothing more than an indulgence.

PC Japanese (JP): 僕は今日まで、オカルトも魔法も、何も信じなかった。お祖父さまの研究だって、…道楽だと心のどこかで馬鹿にしていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 僕は今日まで、オカルトも魔法も、何も信じなかった。{n}お祖父さまの研究だって、…道楽だと心のどこかで馬鹿にしていた。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Até hoje, nunca acreditei no ocultismo ou na magia, nem nada do tipo.{n}Em algum lugar no meu coração, ...eu considerei a pesquisa do vovô como nada mais que uma tolice.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在今日前，神秘學也好、魔法也好，我全都不信。{n}就連爺爺的研究，…我都暗自在心中鄙為了怪癖。

Steam (ST): However, ...I won't make fun of it anymore. ...No, to the contrary, I'll believe strongly that it's real.
Umineko Project (UP): However, ......I won't make fun of it anymore.{n}...No, to the contrary, I strongly believe that it does exist.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, ......I won't make fun of it anymore....No, to the contrary, I strongly believe that it does exist.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, ......não vou mais caçoar dela.{n}...Não, pelo contrário, eu acredito firmemente na existência do seu tema de pesquisa.

Steam (ST): ...If the power of belief can create miracles, I'll probably throw away all of my studies up until today, spending the rest of my life from today onwards studying magic.
Umineko Project (UP): ...If that power of belief can become miracles, I'll probably throw away all of my studies up until today, and spend the rest of my life from today onwards studying magic.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Se esse poder de crença puder se transformar em milagres, provavelmente jogarei fora todos os meus estudos até hoje, e passarei o resto da minha vida de hoje em diante estudando magia.

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Se la forza della fede può trasformarsi in miracoli, probabilmente rinuncerò a tutti gli studi che ho fatto fino ad oggi, e passerò il resto della mia vita a studiare la magia.

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): ......Sorry for saying something so weird. It's my fault that the atmosphere here has gotten so strange. ...Sorry for making you tiptoe around me, even though this is tough for us all."
Umineko Project (UP): "............Sorry for saying such weird things. It's my fault that the atmosphere here has gotten so strange. ...Sorry for making you worry about me, even though this is hard on everybody."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ............Sorry for saying something so weird. It's my fault that the atmosphere here has gotten so strange. ...Sorry for making you worry, even though this is tough for everybody."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………ごめんよ、妙なことを言い出して。僕のせいで、おかしな空気になっちゃったね。…みんなだって辛いだろうに、気を遣わせてごめん」

Steam (ST): ...Even if I did it to divert myself from my sadness, maybe I did say something strange.

Umineko Project (UP): If I keep talking about something so weird, I'm sure it won't heal their sadness...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If I keep talking about something so weird, I'm sure it won't heal their sadness...
